https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3gY6QYuBkzKsGV6dprv3DkRwtmG.jpg This documentary show the work, the worries and the joys of a family dedicated to viticulture, the Potterat, living in Lavaux. Three generations live together, keeping the old traditions Chronique vigneronne
